info.description:
The Syndesis REST API connects to back-end services on the
Syndesis and provides a single entry point for the Syndesis UI.
info.title: Syndesis Internal API

parameters.description: Sort the result list according to the given field value
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Sorting direction when a 'sort' field is provided. Can be 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending)
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Page number to return
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of records per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The search query to filter results on
parameters.name: query

post.description: Retrieves enriched action definition, that is an action definition that has input/output data shapes and property enums defined with respect to the given action properties

200.description: A map of zero or more action property suggestions keyed by the property name

post.description: Creates a new Connector based on the ConnectorTemplate identified by the provided `id` and the data given in `connectorSettings` multipart part, plus optional `icon` file
Provides a summary of the connector as it would be built using a ConnectorTemplate identified by the provided `connector-template-id` and the data given in `connectorSettings`

get.description: Responds with specification that defines this integration

parameters.description: The ID of the integration
parameters.name: id

Content-Type.description: The content type of the specification, e.g. `application/vnd.oai.openapi+json`

204.description: Empty specification provided when definining this integration

404.description: No specification resource defines this integration

put.description: For an integration that is generated from a specification updates it so it conforms to the updated specification

parameters.description: The ID of the integration
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a rolled up metrics summary for all integrations over their lifetime
